import TextField from'@mui/material/TextField';import{styled}from'@mui/material/styles';//텍스트 필드 속성 적용
var CssTextField=styled(TextField)({marginTop:'10px','& label.Mui-focused':{color:'green'},'& .MuiInput-underline:after':{borderBottomColor:'green'},'& .MuiOutlinedInput-root':{'& fieldset':{borderColor:'#000'},'&:hover fieldset':{borderColor:'pink'},'&.Mui-focused fieldset':{borderColor:'green'}}});export default CssTextField;
